alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 3:43PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Laramie County through 415 PM MDT... At 343 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Whitaker, or 14 miles north of Cheyenne, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitaker, North Cheyenne and Ranchettes. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 16 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Cheyenne.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
